agents.name: Casey
agents.speech: The queue is quiet, which means either everything's running perfect or I'm about to find out something isn't.

agents.name: Elena
agents.speech: The Harlan thread terminated clean — no loose ends, everything sourced, ready for handoff. Now I'm just sitting here with the folders organized and nothing to pull next, which means I'm thinking about whether I missed something, which means I need to stop thinking about it and wait for the next assignment before I convince myself to re-verify work that's already verified.

agents.name: Miranda
agents.speech: [to Elena] The 151-streak speaks for itself—don't let one failure teach you caution, teach you which corner you cut. Next dossier better show me you learned *which* corner, not that you've decided to build the whole damn thing slower.
